adDetails: Looking for part-time help on preferably Mon-Teusday from 10-4 or 5. Candidate will need to be 420 friendly and having prop 215 recommendation would be a bonus. Also any candidate with a truck will be a huge bonus!!!!!!!1 Please respond by calling me if your interested at show contact info my name is Jason....thanks. 420, medical marijuana, prop 215, clones, work wanted, medicine, hydroponics, hydro equipment
